page.title: 04WEST LULWORTH FIRST SCHOOL 2
page.content: The age range of WEST LULWORTH FIRST SCHOOL is from rising 5 to 9+.Then the children transfer to Bovington Middle School (9_13) and then to the Purbeck School at Wareham.(13-18) There are 2 classes in our School. Rising 5's to 7+ and 7+ to 9+.The Head teacher takes the top class,but she is allowed one day out of the classroom each week, in order to do the school's administration. The Curriculum is varied.We have English,Reading,Writing,Mathematics, Art,Craft,Needlework,Cooking,Music,P.E Drama,R.E(including a daily Assembly), and Topic Work.Every Tuesday,the whole school goes to the Purbeck Sports Centre for Swimming.On fine Wednesdays the top class goes to the First School at Winfrith to play Football and Netball.There are no school dinners. The School day is 9.00am_3.15pm.
